tuv.seg: Compensation for overbooked, cancelled and delayed flights in the EU
Cúiteamh le haghaidh eitiltí san AE atá ró-áirithithe, curtha ar ceal agus ar a bhfuil moill
• Enforcement of your passenger rights
• Forfheidhmiú do chearta paisinéara
Air passengers have specific consumer rights under European law
Tá ag aerphaisinéirí cearta sonracha tomhaltóirí faoi dhlí na hEorpa
EU Regulation 261/2004 provides protection when:
Leis an Rialachán 261/2004 an AE cosaint sna cásanna a leanas:
• You are denied boarding against your will
• Diúltaítear bordáil duit i gcoinne do thola
• Your flight is cancelled
• Cuirtear d’eitilt ar ceal
• Your flight is delayed
• Cuirtear moill ar d’eitilt
The Regulation applies to all passengers departing from an EU/EEA airport
Baineann an Rialachán le gach paisinéir atá ag imeacht ó aerfort AE/LEE

It also applies to passengers departing from an airport outside of the EU/EEA but arriving at an EU/EEA airport on an EU/EEA licensed carrier (unless they have already received compensation or assistance in that non-EU/EEA country)

Tá feidhm aige freisin maidir le paisinéirí a imíonn ar iompróir ceadúnaithe san AE/LEE ón aerfort lasmuigh den AE/LEE ach a bhfuil teacht ar an aerfort AE/LEE (ach amháin má tá siad faighte cheana cúiteamh nó cúnamh sa tír lasmuigh den AE/LEE)
The Regulation does not apply if you are travelling free of charge or at a fare that is reduced and is not available directly or indirectly to the public
Ní bhíonn an Rialachán i gceist má tá tú ag taisteal saor in aisce nó ar tháille laghdaithe agus nach bhfuil ar fáil go díreach nó go hindíreach ag an bpobal
Tickets purchased under frequent flyer programmes or similar commercial programmes are not considered reduced fare tickets
Ní mheastar gurb ionann ticéid a cheannaítear faoi chláir ‘eitleora mhinic’ nó faoi chláir thráchtála dá macasamhail agus ticéid táille laghdaithe
When you purchase a ticket for air travel, you enter into an agreement with the airline
Nuair a cheannaíonn tú ticéad le haghaidh aerthaistil, iontrálann tú i gcomhaontú leis an aerlíne

One of the terms of this agreement is that you must confirm that you will be ready to take the flight on the date of travel (confirming your reservation) and you must present yourself at check-in to demonstrate that you have a valid ticket and are ready to fly on the date on your ticket

Ceann de théarmaí an chomhaontaithe seo nach mór duit a dheimhniú go mbeidh tú réidh le heitilt ar dháta an taistil (d’áirithint a dheimhniú) agus ní mór duit bheith i láthair ag an ionad seiceála isteach lena léiriú go bhfuil agat ticéad bailí agus go bhfuil tú réidh le heitilt ar an dáta atá le sonrú ar do thicéad
Reservation not confirmed or not checked in
Áirithint gan deimhniú nó gan seiceáil isteach
If you have not confirmed your reservation in time or presented yourself for check-in at the time stipulated by the airline, the Regulation does not apply
Murar dheimhnigh tú d’áirithint laistigh den am ceart nó mura ndeachaigh tú a fhad leis an ionad seiceála isteach ag an am a ordaíonn an aerlíne, ní bhíonn feidhm ag an Rialachán

The airline can refuse to allow you to board the aircraft as you have not honoured your part of the contract with the airline and the airline can legitimately argue that you have breached the terms of your contract with them

Féadfaidh an aerlíne a dhiúltú chun ligean duit an aerárthach a bhordáil de bharr nár chomhlíon tú do chuid den chonradh leis an aerlíne agus féadfaidh an aerlíne an argóint a dhéanamh gur sháraigh tú téarmaí do chonartha leo
If you have been denied access to the aircraft in these circumstances, the airline is not obliged to offer you any compensation nor are you are entitled to any compensation
Má diúltaíodh rochtain duit ar an aerárthach faoi na cúinsí seo, níl dualgas ar an aerlíne aon chúiteamh a thairiscint duit agus níl tú i dteideal aon chúiteamh a fháil
The airline may, however, agree to accommodate you on a later flight (without or without charge) if there is availability
Féadfaidh, ar a shon sin, an aerlíne comhaontú chun glacadh leat ar eitilt níos déanaí (gan ort táille a íoc nó a mhalairt) má bhíonn spás ar an eitilt sin

If you did not confirm your reservation or you did not present yourself for check-in at the stipulated time, it depends on the custom and practice of the individual airline as to whether or not you must pay again for the flight

Murar dheimhnigh tú d’áirithint nó murar tháinig tú i láthair chun seiceáil isteach ag an am a bhí ina choinníoll, braitheann sé ar nós agus ar chleachtas na haerlíne aonair cibé acu an gá duit nó nach gá duit íoc as an eitilt arís
Reservation confirmed and checked in
Áirithint arna deimhniú agus seiceáil isteach

If you are denied boarding, or your flight has been cancelled or delayed, and the Regulation does apply, the airline must provide you with a written notice setting out the rules for compensation and assistance

Má dhiúltaítear bordáil duit, nó má cuireadh d’eitilt ar ceal nó má cuireadh moill uirthi, agus mura mbíonn feidhm ag an Rialachán, ní mór don aerlíne fógra i scríbhinn a sholáthar duit ina leagtar amach na rialacha cúitimh agus cúnta
You must be offered 2 free telephone calls, fax messages, or emails
Ní mór duit 2 ghlao gutháin, 2 theachtaireacht facs nó ríomhphoist saor in aisce a thairiscint duit
In addition, a sign must be displayed at the check-in area referring to air passenger rights under the Regulation
Sa mhullach air sin, ní mór comhartha a thaispeáint sa limistéar seiceála isteach a dhéanann tagairt do cheart aerphaisinéirí faoin Rialachán

Denied boarding means that the airline has refused to accommodate you on scheduled flights and charters although you have a valid ticket, you have confirmed your reservation on your flight and you have presented yourself for check-in within the required time limit as stipulated by the airline

Ciallaíonn bordáil dhiúltaithe gur dhiúltaigh an aerlíne freastal ort ar eitiltí agus ar chairteacha sceidealaithe cé go bhfuil ticéad bailí agat, gur dheimhnigh tú d’áirithint ar d’eitilt agus gur tháinig tú i láthair chun seiceáil isteach laistigh den teorainn ama a iarrtar, faoi mar atá ina choinníoll ag an aerlíne
Denied boarding happens when airlines sell more tickets for a scheduled flight than there are seats on the aircraft
Diúltaítear bordáil nuair a dhíolann aerlínte níos mó ticéad le haghaidh eitilt sceidealaithe ná líon na suíochán ar an aerárthach
Where a flight is overbooked the airline will first call for volunteers to surrender their confirmed reservations to the airline in exchange for agreed benefits
Sa chás go mbíonn eitilt ró-áirithithe, iarrfaidh an aerlíne i dtosach ar dheontóirí chun a n-áirithintí deimhnithe a thabhairt suas don aerlíne mar mhalairt ar shochair lena gcomhaontaítear
The volunteers are also entitled to a choice of:
Ina theannta sin, bíonn na deontóirí i dteideal rogha a bheith acu na rudaí a leanas a fháil:
• Refund of the cost of their ticket within 7 days if not wishing to travel or
• Aisíocaíocht chostas a dticéid laistigh de 7 lá mura mian leo taisteal, nó
• Re-routing to their final destination at the earliest opportunity or
• Bealach eile a aimsiú chuig a gceann scríbe deiridh ag an tráth is luaithe, nó
• Re-routing at a later date at the passenger’s convenience, subject to availability of seats
• Bealach eile a aimsiú ag tráth níos déanaí, ar áisiúlacht an phaisinéara, faoi réir fáil a bheith ar shuíocháin
If there are not enough volunteers, the airline may deny boarding to passengers against their will but must compensate them and offer the appropriate assistance set out in the Regulation

Murab ann do dhóthain deontóirí, féadfaidh an aerlíne bordáil a dhiúltú do phaisinéirí i leith a dtola ach ní mór dóibh cúiteamh a thabhairt dóibh agus an chúnamh chuí a thairiscint dóibh, faoi mar a leagtar amach sa Rialachán
You must also be offered a choice of:
Ní mór rogha den mhéid a leanas a thairiscint duit, chomh maith:
• Refund of the cost of your ticket within 7 days if not wishing to travel or
• Aisíocaíocht chostas do thicéid laistigh de 7 lá mura mian leat taisteal, nó
• Re-routing to your final destination at the earliest opportunity or
• Bealach eile a aimsiú chuig do cheann scríbe deiridh ag an tráth is luaithe, nó
• Re-routing at a later date at your convenience, subject to availability of seats
• Bealach eile a aimsiú ag tráth níos déanaí ar d’áisiúlacht, faoi réir fáil a bheith ar shuíocháin

A refund is a full refund of the ticket for the part or parts of the journey you have not made and for the part or parts you have already made, if the flight is no longer serving any purpose to your original travel plan

Aisíocaíocht is ea aisíocaíocht iomlán an ticéid don chuid/na codanna den aistir nár éirigh leat a dhéanamh agus as an gcuid nó na codanna a rinne tú a thaisteal cheana féin, mura bhfuil an eitilt ag freastal a thuilleadh ach chomh beag ar do bhunphlean taistil
When relevant, it also includes a return flight to your first point of departure at the earliest opportunity
Sa chás gur cuí, áireofar leis eitilt fillte chuig do chéad phointe fágála ag an tráth is luaithe
If you choose a refund, compensation must also be paid
Má roghnaíonn tú aisíocaíocht, ní mór cúiteamh a íoc chomh maith
The amount you are entitled to depends on the distance of the flight that you have not been allowed to board
Braitheann an méid atá tú i dteideal a fháil ar fhad na heitilte a diúltaíodh duit a bhordáil
If you choose re-routing, the compensation that is paid depends on the length of delay past the original planned time in arriving at your final destination
Má roghnaíonn tú bealach eile a aimsiú, braitheann an cúiteamh a íoctar ar fhad na moille tar éis an ama a beartaíodh i dtosach go mbainfeá do cheann scríbe deiridh amach
Free meals and refreshments must be offered in reasonable relation to the waiting time
Ní mór béilí agus sólaistí a thairiscint de mhéid a chomhfhreagraíonn don am feithimh
Hotel accommodation must also be offered free of charge where a stay of one or more nights becomes necessary, as well as transport between the hotel and the airport
Ina theannta sin, ní mór cóiríocht óstáin a thairiscint saor in aisce sa chás go dteastaíonn feitheamh oíche amháin nó níos mó, mar aon le hiompar idir an t-óstán agus an t-aerfort
Where your flight is cancelled, you are entitled to a choice of:
Sa chás go gcuirtear d’eitilt ar ceal, tá tú i dteideal a roghnú:
• Refund of the cost of your ticket within 7 days or
• Aisíocaíocht chostas do thicéid laistigh de 7 lá, nó
• Re-routing to your final destination at the earliest opportunity or
• Bealach eile a aimsiú chuig do cheann scríbe deiridh ag an tráth is luaithe, nó
• Re-routing at a later date at your convenience, subject to availability of seats
• Bealach eile a aimsiú ag tráth níos déanaí, ar d’áisiúlacht, faoi réir fáil a bheith ar shuíocháin
You may also be entitled to compensation
Ina theannta sin uile, d’fhéadfá bheith i dteideal cúiteamh a fháil
When compensation is not payable
Nuair nach iníoctha do chúiteamh
You are not entitled to compensation if:
Níl tú i dteideal cúiteamh a fháil:
• You have received at least 2 weeks’ notice of the cancellation; or
• Má fuair tú fógra ar a laghad 2 sheachtain i leith cealú; nó

• You have received between 2 weeks and 7 days’ notice but you have been offered an alternative flight departing no more than 2 hours before your original departure time and arriving at your final destination less than 4 hours after your original scheduled time of arrival; or

• Fuair tú fógra idir 2 sheachtain agus 7 lá ach go ndearnadh eitilt eile a thairiscint duit a fhágann nach mó ná 2 uair an chloig roimh an am fágála a beartaíodh i dtosach agus a bhainfidh do cheann scríbe deiridh amach níos lú ná 4 huaire i ndiaidh an chéid ama sceidealaithe teachta, nó

• You have received less than 7 days’ notice but you have been offered an alternative flight departing no more than 1 hour before your original departure time and arriving at your final destination less than 2 hours after your original scheduled time of arrival

• Fuair tú fógra níos lú ná 7 lá ach rinneadh eitilt eile a thairiscint duit a fhágann nach mó ná 1 uair an chloig roimh an am fágála a beartaíodh i dtosach agus a bhainfidh do cheann scríbe deiridh amach níos lú ná 2 uair i ndiaidh an chéid ama sceidealaithe teachta

If the airline can prove that the cancellation was caused by an extraordinary circumstance which could not have been avoided, even if all reasonable measures had been taken, no compensation is payable
Más féidir leis an aerlíne a chruthú gur cúinse neamhghnách a bhí ina chúis leis an gcealú nach rabhthas in ann a sheachaint, fiú dá rachfaí i mbun gach birt réasúnta, níl aon chúiteamh iníoctha
Examples of extraordinary circumstances may include weather conditions, air traffic control restrictions, security risks and industrial disputes that affect the operation of the flight

Is éard a d’fhéadfadh bheith ina shamplaí de chúinsí neamhghnácha, coinníollacha aimsire, srianta rialaithe aerthráchta, riosca slándála agus díospóidí tionsclaíocha a dhéanann difear d’oibriú na heitilte
If you choose a refund and you are entitled to compensation, the amount you are entitled to depends on the type of flight
Má roghnaíonn tú aisíocaíocht agus má bhíonn tú i dteideal cúiteamh a fháil, braitheann an méid atá tú i dteideal a fháil ar shaghas na heitilte
Where the choice is re-routing, the compensation that is paid depends on the length of delay past the original planned time in arriving at your final destination
Má roghnaíonn tú bealach eile a aimsiú, braitheann an cúiteamh a íoctar ar fhad na moille tar éis an ama a beartaíodh i dtosach go mbainfeá do cheann scríbe deiridh amach
Free meals and refreshments must be offered in reasonable relation to the waiting time
Ní mór béilí agus sólaistí a thairiscint de mhéid a chomhfhreagraíonn don am feithimh
Hotel accommodation must also be offered free of charge where a stay of one or more nights becomes necessary, as well as transport between the hotel and the airport
Ina theannta sin, ní mór cóiríocht óstáin a thairiscint saor in aisce sa chás go dteastaíonn feitheamh oíche amháin nó níos mó, mar aon le hiompar idir an t-óstán agus an t-aerfort
Whether a delayed flight comes within the terms of the Regulation depends upon the distance of the route involved and the length of the delay
Braitheann cibé acu an dtagann nó nach dtagann eitilt ar a bhfuil moill curtha faoi chuimsiú théarmaí an Rialacháin ar fhad an bhealaigh atá i gceist agus ar fhad na moille
The following flights are covered by the Regulation:
Cuimsítear na heitiltí a leanas ag an Rialachán:
• Delays of 2 hours or more in the case of flights of 1500 km or less
• Moilleanna 2 uair an chloig nó níos mó i gcás eitiltí 1,500km nó níos lú
• Delays of 3 hours or more in the case of all flights within the EU of more than 1500 km, and of all other flights between 1500 and 3500 km
• Moilleanna 3 huaire an chloig nó níos mó i gcás gach eitilte laistigh den AE atá níos faide ná 1,500km, agus gach eitilt eile idir 1,500km agus 3,500km ar fad
• Delays of 4 hours or more in the case of all other flights
• Moilleanna 4 huaire an chloig nó níos mó i gcás eitilte eile
If your delayed flight is covered by the Regulation, free meals and refreshments must be offered in reasonable relation to the waiting time
Má chuimsíonn an Rialachán d’eitilt ar ar cuireadh moill, ní mór béilí agus sólaistí a thairiscint de mhéid a chomhfhreagraíonn don am feithimh
Hotel accommodation must also be offered free of charge where a stay of one or more nights becomes necessary, as well as transport between the hotel and the airport
Ina theannta sin, ní mór cóiríocht óstáin a thairiscint saor in aisce sa chás go dteastaíonn feitheamh oíche amháin nó níos mó, mar aon le hiompar idir an t-óstán agus an t-aerfort
If the flight is delayed at least 5 hours, you must be offered a refund of your ticket instead of flying
Má chuirtear moill ar a laghad 5 huaire ort, ní mór aisíocaíocht do thicéid a thairiscint duit, in ionad eitilte

A refund is a full refund of the ticket for the part or parts of the journey you have not made and for the part or parts you already made if the flight is no longer serving any purpose to your original travel plan

Aisíocaíocht is ea aisíocaíocht iomlán an ticéid don chuid/na codanna den aistir nár éirigh leat a dhéanamh agus as an gcuid nó na codanna a rinne tú a thaisteal cheana féin, mura bhfuil an eitilt ag freastal a thuilleadh ach chomh beag ar do bhunphlean taistil
When relevant, it also includes a return flight to your first point of departure, at the earliest opportunity
Sa chás gur cuí, áireofar leis eitilt fillte chuig do chéad phointe fágála ag an tráth is luaithe
Delays over 3 hours
Moilleanna breis agus 3 huaire an chloig
The Regulation does not state that compensation is payable in cases of delay
Ní luaitear sa Rialachán go bhfuil cúiteamh iníoctha i gcásanna moille

However, on 19 November 2009 the European Court of Justice ruled in the cases of Sturgeon v Condor Flugdienst GmbH and Bock and Others v Air France SA (pdf) that compensation similar to that paid for cancelled flights may be payable in delay situations where the delay exceeds 3 hours

Áfach, an 19 Samhain 2009, rialaigh Cúirt Bhreithiúnais na hEorpa sna cásanna Sturgeon v Condor Flugdienst GmbH agus Bock agus Daoine Eile v Air France SA (pdf) go bhféadfadh cúiteamh macasamhail é sin a íoctar d’eitiltí ar ar cuireadh ceal bheith iníoctha i gcásanna moille ina sáraíonn an mhoill 3 huaire an chloig
This right was upheld by the European Court of Justice in further cases on 23 October 2012
Seasadh an ceart ag an gCúirt Bhreithiúnais Eorpach i gcásanna eile ar an 23 Deireadh Fómhair 2012
The compensation that is paid depends on the distance of the flight and the length of delay past the original planned time in arriving at your final destination
Braitheann an cúiteamh a íoctar ar fad na heitilte agus fad na moille seo caite an t-am bunaidh atá beartaithe chun teacht ar do cheann scríbe deireanach
If the airline can prove that the delay was caused by an extraordinary circumstance which could not have been avoided, even if all reasonable measures had been taken, no compensation is payable
Más féidir leis an aerlíne a chruthú gur cúinse neamhghnách a bhí ina chúis leis an gcealú nach rabhthas in ann a sheachaint, fiú dá rachfaí i mbun gach birt réasúnta, níl aon chúiteamh iníoctha
Compensation when getting a refund
Cúiteamh agus aisíocaíocht á fáil agat
Where a refund of the cost of the ticket is chosen and you are also entitled to compensation, the following compensation must be paid:
Sa chás go roghnaítear aisíocaíocht chostas an ticéid agus go mbíonn tú i dteideal cúiteamh a fháil chomh maith, ní mór an cúiteamh a leanas a íoc:

Má roghnaíonn tú bealach eile a aimsiú agus má bhíonn tú i dteideal cúiteamh a fháil, braitheann an cúiteamh atá tú i dteideal a fháil ar fhad na moille tar éis an ama a beartaíodh i dtosach go mbainfeá do cheann scríbe deiridh amach, mar seo a leanas:

Upgrading and downgrading seats
Suíocháin a uasghrádú agus a íosghrádú
If you are offered a seat in a higher class than your original booking, the airline cannot charge you an additional payment for this seat
Má dhéantar suíochán a thairiscint duit i ngrád níos airde ná d’áirithint i dtosach, ní féidir an aerlíne íocaíocht bhreise a ghearradh orthu don suíochán seo
If you agree to be placed in a lower class than on your original booking, you are entitled to reimbursement of a percentage of the difference in price
Má chomhaontaíonn tú go gcuirfear i ngrád níos ísle thú ná d’áirithint tosaigh, beidh tú i dteideal aisíocaíocht chéatadáin den difríocht sa phraghas a fháil
In other words, if you booked a business/first class seat and the airline offers you a seat in a lower class it must refund you a percentage of the ticket price you originally paid

I bhfriotal eile, má rinne tú suíochán gnó/den chéad ghrád a chur in áirithe, agus má dhéanann an aerlíne suíochán i ngrád níos ísle a thairiscint, ní mór dóibh céatadán de phraghas an ticéid a d’íoc tú i dtosach a aisíoc leat
The percentage of the refund is calculated as follows:
Ríomhtar céatadán na haisíocaíochta mar seo a leanas:
• 30% of the ticket price for flights of 1,500 km or less or
• 30% de phraghas an ticéid d’eitiltí 1,500km nó níos lú, nó
• 50% of the ticket price for intra-EU flights of more than 1,500 km and for all other flights between 1,500 and 3,500 km
• 50% den phraghas an ticéid le haghaidh eitiltí laistigh den AE atá níos mó ná 1,500km ar fad, agus gach eitilt eile idir 1,500km agus 3,500km
• 75% of the price for all flights greater than 3,500 km
• 75% de phraghas an ticéid do gach eitilt níos mó ná 3,500km ar fad

If you are denied boarding, or your flight is cancelled or delayed, on a flight that has been sold as part of a package tour (that is, flight and accommodation), the airline is obliged to compensate the tour operator who has concluded a contract with you

Má dhiúltaítear bordáil duit, nó má chuirtear d'eitilt ar ceal nó má chuirtear moill uirthi, ar eitilt a díoladh mar chuid de thuras pacáiste, (is é sin, eitilt agus cóiríocht), tá dualgas ar an aerlíne oibreoir an turais a chúiteamh a rinneadh cornadh a thabhairt chun conclúide leat
The tour operator entered into a contract with you when it sold you your package tour and these rights are also protected in European law
D’iontráil oibreoir an turais i gconradh leat nuair a díoladh do thuras pacáiste leat agus déantar na cearta seo a chosaint faoi dhlí na hEorpa
Without prejudice to the rights under these laws, the tour operator is obliged to pass on to you the compensation paid by the airline to it
Gan dochar a dhéanamh do na cearta faoi na dlíthe seo, tá dualgas ar oibreoir an turais an cúiteamh a d’íoc an aerlíne leis an oibreoir a thabhairt duit
Enforcement of your passenger rights
Forfheidhmiú do chearta paisinéara
If you have a complaint about the assistance and compensation you have received for denied boarding or cancelled or delayed flights, you must begin by contacting your airline directly

Má bhíonn gearán agat faoin gcúnamh agus faoin gcúiteamh a fuair tú de bharr gur diúltaíodh duit bordáil, nó mar gheall ar eitiltí ar ar cuireadh ceal nó moill, is é an chéad bheart is ceart duit a dhéanamh dul i dteagmháil le d'aerlíne go díreach
If you believe your entitlement to compensation/assistance has not been met, you should then make a complaint to the appropriate national enforcement body
Má mheasann tú nár freastalaíodh ar do theidlíocht i leith cúitimh/cúnaimh, ba cheart duit gearán a dhéanamh leis an gcomhlacht cuí forfheidhmithe náisiúnta
Each member state is responsible for departures from airports within its territory and arrivals into such airports from third countries on EU/EEA-licensed carriers
Tá gach ballstát freagrach as imeachtaí ó aerfoirt laistigh dá bhfearann féin agus as teacht isteach go dtí na haerfoirt sin ó thríú tíortha ar iompróirí ag a bhfuil ceadúnas ón gComhphobal
If you have a complaint about a flight returning to Ireland from the EU/EEA, you contact the national enforcement body in the EU/EEA state your flight departed from
Má bhíonn gearán agat faoi eitilt a fhilleann ar Éirinn ón AE/LEE, déanann tú teagmháil leis an gcomhlacht forfheidhmithe náisiúnta sa stát den AE/LEE inar fhág d’eitilt
The Commission for Aviation Regulation is the national enforcement body in Ireland
Is iad an Coimisiún um Rialáil Eitlíochta an comhlacht forfheidhmithe náisiúnta in Éirinn
It deals with complaints arising from flights departing from Irish airports or those arriving at an Irish airport from outside the EU/EEA on an EUEEA-licensed carrier
Déileálann sé le gearáin a eascraíonn as eitiltí ag imeacht ó aerfoirt na hÉireann nó ó eitiltí teacht ar aerfort Éireannach ó lasmuigh den AE/LEE ar iompróir AE/LEE-ceadúnaithe
Information on how to make a complaint to the Regulator is available on its website
Tá faisnéis ar conas gearán a dhéanamh leis an Rialtóir ar fáil ar a láithreán gréasáin
It also has information on your rights on flightrights.ie
Ina theannta sin, tá ann faisnéis ar do chearta ar flightrights.ie
